title: Katja Becker elected DFG President for another four years
snippet: Katja Becker will continue to hold the position of President of the Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft (DFG, German Research Foundation) for another four years. The General Assembly of the largest research funding organisation and central self-governing organisation for science and the humanities ...

title: DFG, German Research Foundation - Katja Becker Elected President of the DFG
snippet: The Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft (DFG, German Research Foundation) has elected its first female president. On 3 July 2019, biochemist and medical scientist Prof. Dr. Katja Becker from Justus Liebig University Giessen was elected by the DFG’s ...

title: Katja Becker | Global Research Council
snippet: Professor Katja Becker is the President of the Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft (DFG, German Research Foundation).
